pr_title: [satel] Fix for older ETHM-1/INT-RS firmware version

timeline.bodyText: The first letter of every word in a label should be capitalized.
timeline.author: cpmeister
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -47,6 +47,11 @@
 				<description>Encoding used for all the texts received from the module.</description>
 				<default>windows-1250</default>
 			</parameter>
+			<parameter name="extCommands" type="boolean">
+				<label>Extended commands support</label>

timeline.author: cpmeister

 				<default>windows-1250</default>
 			</parameter>
+			<parameter name="extCommands" type="boolean">
